name: The Rooftop Cat
description: Poesy Liang 梁小詩 created the first Rooftop Cat paintings in 2011. The RTC story unfolds of an ambitious cat who plots to fly to the moon to shine amongst the stars. Poesy has a colourful personal history of adversity and resilience. The regional media awards that followed her humanitarian career as well as her widely reported life story, names her to be a formidable ally to reckon with.

name: The Pirate's Daugther
description: An imaginative tale of adventure and legacy, told through powerful visual storytelling.

name: Running Rabbit
description: A metaphorical journey of speed, escape, and freedom depicted through whimsical rabbit illustrations.

name: Harry Putter
description: A humorous and enchanting golf-themed parody with magical illustrations.

name: International Bank of Kindness
description: A symbolic initiative where kindness is a currency, promoting good deeds and compassion.

name: The Rooftop Cat
description: Another installation in the Rooftop Cat series, showcasing the cat's celestial journey.

name: Helping Angels
description: A volunteer initiative bringing aid, joy, and support to people in need.

name: Tuesday Art Angels
description: A recurring art session led by volunteers, inspiring creativity in children and seniors.

name: Thursday Tutoring
description: Weekly tutoring sessions empowering underprivileged students through education and mentorship.

name: Poesy Empathy
description: A personal development program to foster empathy and emotional awareness through storytelling.

name: Bald Empathy Movement
description: A bold statement of solidarity through hair shaving, raising awareness for cancer and empathy.

name: Gratitude Letters
description: An initiative encouraging people to write letters of appreciation to those who impacted their lives.

name: The Rooftop Cat
description: A continued narrative of the beloved Rooftop Cat and its inspiring celestial goals.

name: The Rooftop Cat
description: A new chapter in the Rooftop Cat series, celebrating its journey across rooftops and dreams.

name: Whiskers in Wonderland
description: A dreamy exploration through a feline's fantastical adventure in a surreal landscape of colors and wonder.

name: The Kindness Tree
description: An initiative to plant symbolic kindness trees in communities, promoting empathy and unity.

name: Light Up the Sky
description: An installation art piece where lanterns represent hope, inspired by real stories of courage.

name: Healing Paint
description: A therapeutic painting initiative for hospital patients to express emotions through brush and color.

name: Books Beyond Borders
description: A literacy campaign donating multilingual books to rural and underprivileged communities.

name: Street Symphony
description: A musical outreach project bringing live classical music to the streets and shelters.

name: The Mirror Project
description: A public installation inviting reflection on inner beauty and mental health awareness.

name: Paper Cranes for Peace
description: Thousands of paper cranes folded in collective memory and hope for global peace.

name: Voices of the Forgotten
description: Storytelling sessions that amplify the voices of marginalized and overlooked groups.

name: Sketching for Smiles
description: Volunteer artists draw cheerful caricatures for children in hospitals.

name: The Blanket Pledge
description: Community campaign to hand-sew and donate blankets to the homeless during winter.

name: Color Me Calm
description: Interactive mural activities promoting calmness and collective creativity.

name: Feeding Hope
description: A weekend meal distribution program serving low-income families and elderlies.

name: The Curious Cub
description: A playful tale of a bear cub on a quest of discovery, told through interactive art panels.

name: Hope Journals
description: A journaling program that supports self-reflection and recovery in trauma survivors.

name: Stars for Survivors
description: Origami stars dedicated to survivors of abuse, displayed in public art exhibitions.

name: Echoes of Silence
description: Abstract visual storytelling inspired by unheard voices from silent struggles.

name: The Gifting Wall
description: An anonymous gifting board for people to take or leave items with messages of care.

name: Canvases of Courage
description: A painting exhibit featuring works from individuals who battled illness or hardship.

name: Bridge of Letters
description: A pen-pal initiative linking generations and cultures through hand-written letters.

name: Dream Big Studio
description: A creative art space for children from shelters to express and explore their dreams.

name: The Empathy Booth
description: A mobile listening booth where strangers can share and be heard without judgment.

name: Stories in Stitches
description: A storytelling quilt where each patch is sewn with a life story from the community.

name: Harmony Garden
description: A shared urban garden for people from all backgrounds to grow together—literally and metaphorically.

name: The Lantern Path
description: A nighttime art trail of handmade lanterns telling personal stories of perseverance.

name: Gift of Vision
description: Providing glasses and vision checkups to children in underserved schools.

name: Sunrise Portraits
description: Daily portrait series of early risers and their stories in different cities.

name: Letters to the Sky
description: An open community mailbox to send hopeful messages to lost loved ones.

name: Paws of Peace
description: Art collaborations between children and therapy animals to promote compassion.

name: Wings of Stories
description: Community mural of wings composed of written personal stories by residents.
